text: @ACTforAmerica @realDonaldTrump Imagine if #BunkerBoy was focused on American lives being lost to #TrumpVirus #COVID19 instead of golfing, holding racist rallies where the virus spreads & not aiding #Putin in killing our troops. But oh well,  #PutinsPuppet can only focus on one thing at a time & that’s golfing
